title: Cruel Intentions
description: Lydia Townsend would rather the earth swallow her whole than be the center of attention.A night in watching Netflix with her girls is perfectly fine with her.But when one of her best friends convinces her to go to the schools annual party on the outskirts of town, she doesn't expect to find herself the sole focus of an extremely alluring mysterious, masked stranger.However, this is Sinnerâ€™s Night... expect the unexpected.This is a night when inhibitions are just a word in the dictionary.Friendships are tested.And even the most innocent girls in school are tempted by the dark.As the night goes on, Lydia soon realizes, her masked stranger isn't as unknown as she originally thought...Cruel Intentions contains explicit sexual scenes.
author: C. Standing
